item.title: About
item.description: I write code to automate things, compose music, and analyze data. My main interests are in machine learning, natural language processing and music processing, but I also read on various topics such as decentralized technologies, and mathetmatics in general. My projects You can check my public projects on https://github.com/adamoudad/ They include melody generation using LSTM, hashtag annotation for text, easy playlist creator for youtube videos without needing an account, algorithmic trading, scripts for web scraping, and more to come !
